name: PRS7
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gesture seven
des:
Let's play the game of rock paper scissors with skill. 
Possible hand gestures are Rock, Water, Air, Paper, Sponge, Scissors, and Fire. 

Rock is stronger than Fire, Scissors and Sponge. Water is stronger than Rock, Fire and Scissors. 
Air is stronger than Water, Rock and Fire. Paper is stronger than Air, Water and Rock. 
Sponge is stronger than Paper, Air and Water. Scissors is stronger than Sponge, Paper and Air. 
Fire is stronger than Scissors, Sponge and Paper. 

How to call the skill： "Alexa, open gesture seven"
Possible hand gestures: Rock, Water, Air, Paper, Sponge, Scissors, and Fire. 
how to say hand gesture："Sponge", "Water hand", "go Paper", "I choose Fire", "My gesture is Rock", etc.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
